name: Catherine Combes
content: Catherine COMBES Snail mail: Catherine COMBES Laboratoire Hubert Curien 18 rue du Professeur Benoit Lauras F42000 Saint-Etienne FRANCE E-mail: catherine[dot] combes[at] univ–st–etienne [dot] fr Short bio I defended my Phd in 1994 at the University of Clermont-Ferrand (France). Since 1995, I am assistant professor at the University Jean Monnet (UJM) of Saint-Etienne and I am member of the Laboratoire Hubert Curien UMR CNRS 5516 in the Machine Learning Team . Research interests Artificial intelligence - Deep learning Data mining Forecasting and decision Complex data - Imbalanced Data Amoroso's family distributions (specially, Generalized Extreme Value and 4th-parameter Generalized Gamma Distributions): Fitting. Application domain: Health care Publications International journals: C.COMBES, H.K.T.
